title: Why domestic violence victims don't leave
description: Leslie Morgan Steiner was in "crazy love" -- that is, madly in love with a man who routinely abused her and threatened her life. Steiner tells the story of her relationship, correcting misconceptions many people hold about victims of domestic violence, and explaining how we can all help break the silence.
author: Leslie Morgan Steiner
keywords: TED, talks, culture, global issues, love, relationships, violence, women
